{{Stub}} {{infobox character | people=[[Noldor|Noldo]] | name=Faniel | image=Tajmah - Faniel.jpg | caption="Faniel" by [[:Category:Images by Tajmah|Tajmah]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Valinor]] | affiliation= | language=[[Quenya]] | birth=between {{YT|1190}} and {{YT|1230}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Finwë]] | parentage=[[Finwë]] and [[Indis]] | siblings=[[Fëanor]] (half-brother), [[Findis]], [[Fingolfin]], [[Írimë|Finvain]], and [[Finarfin]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Faniel''' was a [[Ñoldor|Ñoldorin Elf]] that was the third daughter of [[Finwë]] and [[Indis]] in an apparently discarded concept of the [[legendarium]].{{PM|XI}}, p. 359 She had two brothers, [[Fingolfin]] and [[Finarfin]], two sisters, [[Findis]] and [[Írimë|Finvain]] and a half-brother, [[Fëanor]].''[[The History of Middle-earth]]'', Vol. X: ''[[Morgoth's Ring]]'', Part Three: "The Later Quenta Silmarillion" == History == Faniel was born during the [[Noontide of Valinor]], probably in [[Tirion]]. She did not leave [[Valinor]] during the [[Flight of the Noldor]],{{MR|P3}}, ''Of Finwë and Míriel''; ''Note 10'' remaining instead in [[Aman]]. == Etymology == ''Faniel'' was a [[Quenya]] name comprised of an unknown element and ''[[-iel]]'' ("daughter, feminine suffix").{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-2165698273.html|articlename=Q.
